attributes.action: Teach CPR before you leave High School!
attributes.additional_details: So many people don't know how to do CPR and although there are many courses you can attend people don't because it isn't something they think about or are interested in or think they will ever have to do but these situations are unexpected and you never know if you will have to do it. I think it is really important you get taught how to give CPR before leaving High School. By learning how to give CPR you could be saving somebodies life which is vitally important.
attributes.background: Teach young people before they leave high school to give CPR. I think it is really important you get taught how to give CPR before leaving High School. By learning how to give CPR you could be saving somebodies life which is vitally important.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584705
